channel.title: How to fix this dupe please
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wAHmRPGKfXw :palm:
CHEAT ENGINE PLEASE HELP I REALLY NEED THIS DONE :( :palm:

item.title: How to fix this dupe please
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Actually sk8er. For one, no need to be a dick hole. For 2. It does. I have fixed 3 Cheat engine dupes INCLUDING that one with UID. So stop being a no-it-all . THANK YOU :palm: :palm:

UID’s are to verify the client is the only thing connected to the server, more specifically only the one client. If you don’t add a server sided check, you can still do the exact same dupes on cheat engine, because you can still tell the client to send a fake packet to the server.

I won’t restate it again, ADD SERVER-SIDED CHECKS.
Trust me, this stops a lot more dupes than you could care to think about.

Edit: Also, anything I said yesterday between 5pm and midnight may not be my best words, as I was not sober at said time.

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix this dupe please

item.title: How to fix this dupe please
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

UID’s DON’T STOP CHEAT ENGINE DUPES you idiots.

Add a server sided check to make sure each item exists.

item.source: How to fix this dupe please

item.title: How to fix this dupe please
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“lol space, post:3, topic:537962”]Customize the UID in your SignLink.java <-- Client sides
And in… RS2LoginProtocolDecoder.java <-- Server sided.

It fixes most Cheat engine bugs/dupes.

For example…

if(uid == 0 || uid == 99735086) { session.close(); return false; } if(uid != 123456) { session.close(); return false; }
In RS2LoginProtocolDecoder.java search for something like that. It will probably we coded out with “/* and */” symbols. Just remove those symbols, and it should fix the dupe.

If it doesn’t work. Mind posting your RS2LoginProtocolDecoder.java file and your current base / source?

Thanks[/quote]

I like this, I’d give you rep if it was possible HINT HINT ADMINS

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix this dupe please

item.title: How to fix this dupe please
item.dc:creator: @lol_space1 lol space
item.description:
@lol_space1 wrote:

Customize the UID in your SignLink.java <-- Client sides
And in… RS2LoginProtocolDecoder.java <-- Server sided.

It fixes most Cheat engine bugs/dupes.

For example…

if(uid == 0 || uid == 99735086) { session.close(); return false; } if(uid != 123456) { session.close(); return false; }
In RS2LoginProtocolDecoder.java search for something like that. It will probably we coded out with “/* and */” symbols. Just remove those symbols, and it should fix the dupe.

If it doesn’t work. Mind posting your RS2LoginProtocolDecoder.java file and your current base / source?

Thanks

Read full topic
